org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.plugins.index.lucene

Class OakCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.codecs.Codec
      • org.apache.lucene.codecs.FilterCodec
        • org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.plugins.index.lucene.OakCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.lucene.util.NamedSPILoader.NamedSPI

    public class OakCodec
extends org.apache.lucene.codecs.FilterCodec
    Oak specific Codec. It simply mimics Lucene46Codec but with uncompressed StoredFieldsFormat.
